author: geirm
msg: Small cleanup of loop.vm/.cmp to work with lastest parser (now that jason's cool introspection stuff is done and working) and method.vm/.cmp to hide a small issue that you probably can't find anyway, but will fix soon. :)

author: geirm
msg: The usual gang. (See previous Parser.jjt fix : separate REFMOD2 and DIRECTIVE RPAREN)

author: geirm
msg: Separated the ) for REFMOD2 and DIRECTIVE to keep REFMOD2 from eating the whitespace.

author: jvanzyl
msg: - update the initialization system, by cloning the context for
the initialization phase, then throwing it away and use the
original context for the rendering phase.

author: jvanzyl
msg: - make sure all RHS values are place in the context, this ensures
that subsequent introspection of VTL performs correctly.
